name: The Lepus Run
description:
-Made For The Vertex Game Jam-

You are a Rabbit, a rabbit who constantly expands in size at an abnormal rate. Race through different stages as you try not to get caught up in spaces to tiny for your chubby body! Else you might just explode from the pressure... 

This is a speed run game where you must be constantly aware of your surroundings, else you might get stuck and soon, perish..

Controls:

Space to Dash Through The Air                WASD to Move                                 Arrow Keys to Move

The Game Jams theme was Start Small. 

Credits:

Music By Komiku:
